name: Ryan Gigs
comment: The team helped me during a challenging time in my life. My father had recently passed, and as the only child I was left handling his estate and the sale of his home. The property was in disrepair and had lots of stuff he'd accumulated over the years. Their team, walked the property, and made me a fair, all cash As-Is offer on the spot. They made the process extremely easy. And they closed within 3 weeks! I highly recommend working with them if you have a house you need to sell.
